name: BoardwalkRunning
0:
”Alexa open Boardwalk Running”
”Alexa ask Boardwalk Running to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boardwalk running
des:
Boardwalk Running simulates the sound environment of running on a boardwalk, combining the sounds of wooden planks underfoot with the surrounding natural ambiance. It might include the sound of waves, seagulls, and a distant murmur of people, aimed at creating an immersive experience of a run by the beach.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Boardwalk Running
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
